beijing.notes: Short-term rental near Tsinghua University, estimated 4,000-6,000 RMB for period

notes: All hotel check-in times are standard 14:00 (2:00 PM), check-out 12:00 noon unless noted otherwise. Family home stays (Days 2-3) are free. Beijing rental apartment cost is estimated based on short-term rental market rates in Haidian District near universities (4,000-6,000 RMB/month). Specific apartment address TBD - recommend booking through Ziroom app or Airbnb China. All hotel rates are estimates and should be confirmed on booking platforms. InterContinental Chongqing allows early luggage storage for 4:40am arrival. Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel has excellent reviews for location and comfort. Orange Hotel Beijing is budget-friendly option for one-night stay before moving to apartment.

booking_recommendations.intercontinental_chongqing: Book directly through IHG website or Trip.com/Ctrip for best rates
booking_recommendations.shanghai_sk_lusso: Book through Trip.com, Booking.com, or contact hotel directly
booking_recommendations.beijing_orange_hotel: Book through Trip.com/Ctrip (most reliable for Chinese hotel chains)
booking_recommendations.beijing_rental_apartment: Use Ziroom app (English interface) or Airbnb China. Book ASAP for 13-night stay during peak season. Ensure location is within 30 minutes of Tsinghua University for girlfriend's classes. Verify foreign passport acceptance.

important_considerations: All hotels in China require valid passport for check-in
Some hotels may require registration with local police (usually handled by hotel)
Beijing rental apartment MUST accept foreign guests - confirm before booking
Consider location of Beijing apartment relative to girlfriend's class schedule (Tue/Wed/Thu)
Book Beijing accommodation early - Chinese New Year period may have limited availability
Shanghai SK Lusso Hotel breakfast included - saves money on 4 mornings
InterContinental Chongqing breakfast is CNY 228/person - expensive, consider eating out
